name: Clutch (itch) (The_AJ)
description:
This game is a simple top-down shooter where the player must progress through a never ending wave system. The player is able to earn money from killing enemies and is able to spend it on new guns and upgrades at the shops at the top of the map.

Controls for this game will come in a future update, so here is a quick rundow:

Move- WASD

Shoot- M1

Shield- M2

Switch Weapon- Scroll Wheel

Purchase- E
